issue.title: socialgirls.im
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://socialgirls.im/index/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsocialgirls.im%2Findex%2F) ### Comment Username: @egoistinr > > 如果開adguard 那網站就一直重新整理 > 如果不開 按任何地方第1下他就一直跳出會被擋掉的視窗 > chrome的網站設定內跳轉跟廣告都封鎖了還是如此 > 想問問即使不開adguard 的情況下 > 有沒有辦法只要是被擋的視窗畫面就自己關掉啊(頂多提示一下有東西被關掉) > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/LvW36TV.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.0.181 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Turkish,
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
Thai Ads Filters,
ABPVN List
